cona said. Gangon waited while Dracona flew away.

        "Hey! Wait! You forgot to untie meeeee!" Gangon screamed.

 Group members. The Radicons, Plintissa, Dracona, and Artist all entered th=
e Poeple's base through the secret passage way, the computer reconizing the=
m as friends. Train Wreck and Airbomber stepped into a door.

 called out. Arrow steps out of the CR Chamber all healed up.

nd it's big enough to put a table in to play cards! How come we never notic=
ed this room before?" Airbomber said. Stranato walked into the room. Strong=
hold and Blender followed.

                                "Wait up guys!"=
 Arrow called out, running into the room. Plintissa sealed the door magneti=
cally upon order from Train Wreck, the Radicons were locked inside the room=
 to sort out their problems. There was alot of banging, but it eventually s=
topped. Alot of name calling, too. Plintissa laughed and sat down at a tabl=
e to play cards with Dracona.

                                "Oh, man! No=
t even a drop of beer in here! We'll dehydrate drinking water!" Stronghold =

 smoke!" Blender said.

than all of you idiots put together! I'm getting fat and need to exercise!"=
 Stranato yelled.

et along! I don't like it in here neither!" Arrow said. Stranato looked at =
him like he was going to kill him. Arrow cowered in the corner.

          =

 up against Stranato and his stupid rules! This was our idea!" Train Wreck =
yelled.

                                "Yeah, and nobody is getting out o=
f here until we are all friends again." Airbomber said.

                  =

tarted pacing the room. Stronghold and Blender started to look in cracks in=
 the wall for something to drink, despite plenty of water in this room. Tra=
in Wreck was discussing something with Arrow and Airbomber, and Stronghold =
and Blender joined them before long.

                                "Say,=
 you guys, it's really lonely sitting here with nothing to do, and--"

you can join us!" Arrow said, cutting off Stranato. Stranato walks over and=
 sits with them. Stronghold pulls out a pack of playing cards.

and out of the secret passgeway, taking a walk across a field...
